main event: A round, cone-shaped object, silver in color, was observed flying at a high speed, leaving long streaks of fire out of its back.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on December 7, 1957, and lasted only 5 seconds., The object was the size of a baseball and traveled from east to west., Weather conditions were described as clear with snow showers in the area., The report raised multiple possibilities regarding the object's identification, including balloon, missile, and aircraft., There is no photograph associated with this sighting.
